fields.Title: February Light
fields.Description/Abstract: My poetry manuscript, <em>February Light, </em>has been accepted for publication by BCC Press in Salt Lake City, UT. It contains more than 70 poems. Twenty poems have appeared or are forthcoming in magazines of good reputation, all with a national/international reach, except for five poems that have been published in the local annual WITA anthology published by The Cabin. Many of the poems have been presented at residency and other publication gatherings.
